div.p: Copyright Statement: These codes are excerpted from Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine (DICOM) Standard, Part 16: Content Mapping Resource, Copyright 2011 by the National Electrical Manufacturers Association
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://nema.org/dicom/dicm
CodeDisplayDefinition
ONLINEResources are immediately available.
OFFLINEResources need to be retrieved by manual intervention.
NEARLINEResources need to be retrieved from relatively slow media.
UNAVAILABLEResources cannot be retrieved.

copyright.value: These codes are excerpted from Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine (DICOM) Standard, Part 16: Content Mapping Resource, Copyright 2011 by the National Electrical Manufacturers Association

valueString.value: Resources need to be retrieved by manual intervention.
Resources need to be retrieved from relatively slow media.
